_header: This false mans thought was all in sin
Subjects: usury; devil; debates, between angels and devils
_description: Dispute between demons and angels at the death-bed of a usurer — eleven couplets

NLS1844.First Lines:
þis fals mannes thoght was all in synnefor drede of god ne
                    walde he blynneþat is falsly he wroght in ilke a dedeþe
                    wrathe of god he wan to mede…
NLS1844.Last Lines:
…Oures he is ȝif he come lateWe shal hym lede to heuen
                    ȝate
NLS1844.Editions:
Barnicle,  Mary Elizabeth. 
             “The ‘Exemplum’ of the Penitent Usurer.” 
             PMLA
         33 (1918): 409-28: 417-18.
